Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the interior is slightly grooved and spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of a red-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394936) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394936)
